title: If a company shipped the wrong item to my house & refunded, can I keep the item
transcript: but from india he bought something online when it came it wasn't according to the specifications he complained so they refunded the money and told him keep the product can he keep it the answer is yes if he did not lie sometimes i may get a product and it doesn't look nice after seeing it so i say uh yeah the color is not what i wanted i'm lying so they refund the money this money is haram but if it's actually ordered metal and they brought me something that is plastic no this is not what i wanted if they say keep it and they funded the money you can use it
